definitions: An act or sound of scraping.
An injury or mark produced by scraping; an abrasion.
A difficult or awkward situation that one has got into.
A small amount of something scraped off a surface.
examples: The scrape of chairs on the floor was annoying.
He had a scrape on his knee from falling.
They got into a scrape with the law.
She collected a scrape of paint for analysis.
